item.title: Units tests using xUnit and Visual Studio Team Services for DNX projects
item.description: Introduction DNX will soon be released and there’ll be a growing number of developers wanting to write unit tests to improve the quality of developments. Ideally you’d like to run these unit tests in a continuous integration process in order to make sure you didn’t introduce any regression/bug or degraded performances. In .NET world you have many tools to write unit tests: MSTest/VSTest NUnit xUnit
